column2: #| fig-cap: Price Trend for Six of the Loblaws "No Name" Groceries Over Time (left) and Price Distribution by Size (right).
# Plot price trends over time by product_id
p1 <- ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = date, y = current_price, group = product_id, color = label)) +
title = "Price Trend for Products by Date",
p2 <- ggplot(analysis_data, aes(x = size, y = current_price, fill = size)) +
labs(x = "Size", y = "Price", title = "Price Distribution by Size")  +
